trans-unit.source: Set up and use the Machine Learning Recommendations API | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Set up and use the Machine Learning Recommendations API | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Microsoft RECOMMENDATIONS API built with Azure Machine Learning FAQ
trans-unit.target: Microsoft RECOMMENDATIONS API built with Azure Machine Learning FAQ

trans-unit.source: Setting up and using Machine Learning Recommendations API FAQ
trans-unit.target: Setting up and using Machine Learning Recommendations API FAQ

trans-unit.source: What is RECOMMENDATIONS?
trans-unit.target: What is RECOMMENDATIONS?

trans-unit.source: For organizations and businesses that rely on recommendations to cross-sell and up-sell products and services to their customers, RECOMMENDATIONS in Azure Machine Learning provides a self-service recommendations engine.
trans-unit.target: For organizations and businesses that rely on recommendations to cross-sell and up-sell products and services to their customers, RECOMMENDATIONS in Azure Machine Learning provides a self-service recommendations engine.

trans-unit.source: It is an implementation of collaborative filtering that uses matrix factorization as its core algorithm.
trans-unit.target: It is an implementation of collaborative filtering that uses matrix factorization as its core algorithm.

trans-unit.source: Application developers can access RECOMMENDATIONS by using REST APIs.
trans-unit.target: Application developers can access RECOMMENDATIONS by using REST APIs.

trans-unit.source: What can I do with RECOMMENDATIONS?
trans-unit.target: What can I do with RECOMMENDATIONS?

trans-unit.source: RECOMMENDATIONS takes as input an item or a set of items and returns a list of relevant recommendations.
trans-unit.target: RECOMMENDATIONS takes as input an item or a set of items and returns a list of relevant recommendations.

trans-unit.source: For example: A customer of an online retailer clicks a product.
trans-unit.target: For example: A customer of an online retailer clicks a product.

trans-unit.source: The online retailer sends that product as input to RECOMMENDATIONS, gets a list of products in return, and decides which of these products will be shown to the customer.
trans-unit.target: The online retailer sends that product as input to RECOMMENDATIONS, gets a list of products in return, and decides which of these products will be shown to the customer.

trans-unit.source: You may want to use RECOMMENDATIONS to optimize your online store or even to inform your inside sales department or call center.
trans-unit.target: You may want to use RECOMMENDATIONS to optimize your online store or even to inform your inside sales department or call center.

trans-unit.source: Are there any usage limitations?
trans-unit.target: Are there any usage limitations?

trans-unit.source: Recommendations has the following usage limitations:
trans-unit.target: Recommendations has the following usage limitations:

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of models per subscription: 10
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of models per subscription: 10

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of items that a catalog can hold: 100,000
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of items that a catalog can hold: 100,000

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of usage points that are kept is ~5,000,000.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of usage points that are kept is ~5,000,000.

trans-unit.source: The oldest will be deleted if new ones will be uploaded or reported.
trans-unit.target: The oldest will be deleted if new ones will be uploaded or reported.

trans-unit.source: Maximum size of data that can be sent in email (for example, import catalog data, import usage data) is 200 MB
trans-unit.target: Maximum size of data that can be sent in email (for example, import catalog data, import usage data) is 200 MB

trans-unit.source: Number of transactions per second (TPS) for a Recommendations model build that is not active is ~2 TPS.
trans-unit.target: Number of transactions per second (TPS) for a Recommendations model build that is not active is ~2 TPS.

trans-unit.source: A Recommendations model build that is active can hold up to 20 TPS.
trans-unit.target: A Recommendations model build that is active can hold up to 20 TPS.

trans-unit.source: Purchase and Billing
trans-unit.target: Purchase and Billing

trans-unit.source: How much does Recommendations cost during the launch period?
trans-unit.target: How much does Recommendations cost during the launch period?

trans-unit.source: Recommendations is a subscription-based service.
trans-unit.target: Recommendations is a subscription-based service.

trans-unit.source: Charging is based on volume of transactions per month.
trans-unit.target: Charging is based on volume of transactions per month.

trans-unit.source: You can check the [offer page] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations) in Microsoft Azure Marketplace for pricing information.
trans-unit.target: You can check the [offer page] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations) in Microsoft Azure Marketplace for pricing information.

trans-unit.source: Are there any costs associated with having Recommendations track and store user activity for me?
trans-unit.target: Are there any costs associated with having Recommendations track and store user activity for me?

trans-unit.source: Not at the moment.
trans-unit.target: Not at the moment.

trans-unit.source: Does Recommendations have a free trial?
trans-unit.target: Does Recommendations have a free trial?

trans-unit.source: There is a free trail which is restricted to 10,000 transactions per month.
trans-unit.target: There is a free trail which is restricted to 10,000 transactions per month.

trans-unit.source: When will I be billed for Recommendations?
trans-unit.target: When will I be billed for Recommendations?

trans-unit.source: A paid subscription is any subscription for which there is a monthly fee.
trans-unit.target: A paid subscription is any subscription for which there is a monthly fee.

trans-unit.source: When you purchase a paid subscription, you are immediately charged for the first month's use.
trans-unit.target: When you purchase a paid subscription, you are immediately charged for the first month's use.

trans-unit.source: You are charged the amount that is associated with the offer on the subscription page (plus applicable taxes).
trans-unit.target: You are charged the amount that is associated with the offer on the subscription page (plus applicable taxes).

trans-unit.source: This monthly charge is made each month on the same calendar date as your original purchase until you cancel the subscription.
trans-unit.target: This monthly charge is made each month on the same calendar date as your original purchase until you cancel the subscription.

trans-unit.source: How do I upgrade to a higher tier service?
trans-unit.target: How do I upgrade to a higher tier service?

trans-unit.source: You can buy or update your subscription from the [offer page] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations) page on Microsoft Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: You can buy or update your subscription from the [offer page] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations) page on Microsoft Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: When you upgrade a subscription:
trans-unit.target: When you upgrade a subscription:

trans-unit.source: Transactions that are remaining on your old subscription are not added to your new subscription.
trans-unit.target: Transactions that are remaining on your old subscription are not added to your new subscription.

trans-unit.source: You pay full price for the new subscription, even though you have unused transactions on your old subscription.
trans-unit.target: You pay full price for the new subscription, even though you have unused transactions on your old subscription.

trans-unit.source: Process to upgrade a subscription:
trans-unit.target: Process to upgrade a subscription:

trans-unit.source: Nevigate to the [offer page] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations).
trans-unit.target: Nevigate to the [offer page] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations).

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the Marketplace if you aren't already Signed in.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the Marketplace if you aren't already Signed in.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, all the available plans are listed.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, all the available plans are listed.

trans-unit.source: Click the radio button for the plan you want to upgrade to.
trans-unit.target: Click the radio button for the plan you want to upgrade to.

trans-unit.source: If you want to upgrade, click OK.
trans-unit.target: If you want to upgrade, click OK.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to upgrade, click Cancel.
trans-unit.target: If you do not want to upgrade, click Cancel.

trans-unit.source: Important Carefully read the dialog box before you upgrade because there are billing and use implications.
trans-unit.target: Important Carefully read the dialog box before you upgrade because there are billing and use implications.

trans-unit.source: When will my subscription to Recommendations end?
trans-unit.target: When will my subscription to Recommendations end?

trans-unit.source: Your subscription will end when you cancel it.
trans-unit.target: Your subscription will end when you cancel it.

trans-unit.source: If you would like to cancel your subscriptions, see the following instructions.
trans-unit.target: If you would like to cancel your subscriptions, see the following instructions.

trans-unit.source: How do I cancel my Recommendations subscription?
trans-unit.target: How do I cancel my Recommendations subscription?

trans-unit.source: To cancel your subscription, use the following steps. If your current subscription is a paid subscription, your subscription continues in effect until the end of the current billing period. If you need the cancellation to be effective immediately, contact us at <link><linkText>Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To cancel your subscription, use the following steps. If your current subscription is a paid subscription, your subscription continues in effect until the end of the current billing period. If you need the cancellation to be effective immediately, contact us at <link><linkText>Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Note No refund is given if you cancel before the end of a billing period or for unused transactions in a billing period.
trans-unit.target: Note No refund is given if you cancel before the end of a billing period or for unused transactions in a billing period.

trans-unit.source: Nevigate to the [offer page] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations).
trans-unit.target: Nevigate to the [offer page] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations).

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the Marketplace if you aren't already Signed in.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the Marketplace if you aren't already Signed in.

trans-unit.source: Click Cancel to the right of the dataset name and status.
trans-unit.target: Click Cancel to the right of the dataset name and status.

trans-unit.source: You can use this subscription until the end of the current billing period or your transaction limit is reached (whichever occurs first).
trans-unit.target: You can use this subscription until the end of the current billing period or your transaction limit is reached (whichever occurs first).

trans-unit.source: If you would like to cancel your subscription immediately so you can purchase a new subscription, file a ticket at <link><linkText>Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you would like to cancel your subscription immediately so you can purchase a new subscription, file a ticket at <link><linkText>Microsoft Support</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Getting started with Recommendations
trans-unit.target: Getting started with Recommendations

trans-unit.source: Is Recommendations for me?
trans-unit.target: Is Recommendations for me?

trans-unit.source: Recommendations in Machine Learning is for organizations and businesses that rely on recommendations to cross-sell and up-sell products or services to their customers.
trans-unit.target: Recommendations in Machine Learning is for organizations and businesses that rely on recommendations to cross-sell and up-sell products or services to their customers.

trans-unit.source: If you have a customer-facing website, a sales force, an inside sales force, or a call center, and if you offer a catalog of more than a few dozen products or services, your bottom line may benefit from using Recommendations.
trans-unit.target: If you have a customer-facing website, a sales force, an inside sales force, or a call center, and if you offer a catalog of more than a few dozen products or services, your bottom line may benefit from using Recommendations.

trans-unit.source: Experimenting with Recommendations is designed to be fairly simple.
trans-unit.target: Experimenting with Recommendations is designed to be fairly simple.

trans-unit.source: The current API-based version requires basic programming skills.
trans-unit.target: The current API-based version requires basic programming skills.

trans-unit.source: If you need assistance, contact the vendor who developed your website.
trans-unit.target: If you need assistance, contact the vendor who developed your website.

trans-unit.source: If you have an internal IT department or an in-house developer, they should be able to get Recommendations to work for you.
trans-unit.target: If you have an internal IT department or an in-house developer, they should be able to get Recommendations to work for you.

trans-unit.source: What are the prerequisites for setting up Recommendations?
trans-unit.target: What are the prerequisites for setting up Recommendations?

trans-unit.source: Recommendations requires that you have a log of user choices as it relates to your catalog.
trans-unit.target: Recommendations requires that you have a log of user choices as it relates to your catalog.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have such a log and you do have a customer facing website, Recommendations can collect user activity for you.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t have such a log and you do have a customer facing website, Recommendations can collect user activity for you.

trans-unit.source: Recommendations also requires a catalog of your products or services.
trans-unit.target: Recommendations also requires a catalog of your products or services.

trans-unit.source: If you don’t have the catalog, Recommendations can use the actual customer usage data and distill a catalog.
trans-unit.target: If you don’t have the catalog, Recommendations can use the actual customer usage data and distill a catalog.

trans-unit.source: An “implied” catalog will not include items that were not “reported” as part of user transactions.
trans-unit.target: An “implied” catalog will not include items that were not “reported” as part of user transactions.

trans-unit.source: How do I set up Recommendations for the first time?
trans-unit.target: How do I set up Recommendations for the first time?

trans-unit.source: After [subscribing] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations) to Recommendations, you should use the API documentation in the <link><linkText>Azure Machine Learning Recommendations – Quick Start Guide</linkText><title></title></link> to set up the service.
trans-unit.target: After [subscribing] (https://datamarket.azure.com/dataset/amla/recommendations) to Recommendations, you should use the API documentation in the <link><linkText>Azure Machine Learning Recommendations – Quick Start Guide</linkText><title></title></link> to set up the service.

trans-unit.source: Where can I find API documentation?
trans-unit.target: Where can I find API documentation?

trans-unit.source: The API documentation is <link><linkText>Azure Machine Learning Recommendations – Quick Start Guide</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The API documentation is <link><linkText>Azure Machine Learning Recommendations – Quick Start Guide</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: What options do I have to upload catalog and usage data to Recommendations?
trans-unit.target: What options do I have to upload catalog and usage data to Recommendations?

trans-unit.source: You have two options for uploading your catalog and usage data: You can export the data from your CRM system or other logs and upload it to Recommendations, or you can add tags to your website that will track user activities.
trans-unit.target: You have two options for uploading your catalog and usage data: You can export the data from your CRM system or other logs and upload it to Recommendations, or you can add tags to your website that will track user activities.

trans-unit.source: If you use the latter method, the data will be stored in Azure.
trans-unit.target: If you use the latter method, the data will be stored in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Maintenance and support
trans-unit.target: Maintenance and support

trans-unit.source: How large can my data set be?
trans-unit.target: How large can my data set be?

trans-unit.source: Each data set can contain up to 100,000 catalog items and up to 2048 MB of usage data.
trans-unit.target: Each data set can contain up to 100,000 catalog items and up to 2048 MB of usage data.

trans-unit.source: In addition, a subscription can contain up to 10 data sets (models).
trans-unit.target: In addition, a subscription can contain up to 10 data sets (models).

trans-unit.source: Where can I get technical support for Recommendations?
trans-unit.target: Where can I get technical support for Recommendations?

trans-unit.source: Technical support is available on the <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Support</linkText><title></title></link> site.
trans-unit.target: Technical support is available on the <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Support</linkText><title></title></link> site.

trans-unit.source: Where can I find the terms of use?
trans-unit.target: Where can I find the terms of use?

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Recommendations API Terms of Service</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Recommendations API Terms of Service</linkText><title></title></link>.
